#summary Retrieve the root inventory folder UUID for the specified owner.
#labels Protocol-Inventory

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||GetInventoryRoot||String||Yes||
||OwnerID||UUID of the inventory owner||UUID||Yes||

{{{
POST /services/ HTTP/1.1
User-Agent: Simian Login Client
Content-Length: 72
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

RequestMethod=GetRootFolder
&OwnerID=2960f0cd-2bd3-4559-89ea-d86cc3696c7a
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||FolderID||UUID of the root folder||UUID||

{{{
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Tue, 08 Dec 2009 23:28:43 GMT
Server: Apache/2.2.10 (Linux/SUSE)
X-Powered-By: Simian Grid Services
Content-Length: 51
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "FolderID":"3dc86b9d-da9d-4f7e-8ddb-5d5b06279b2e"
}
}}}

= Supported Response Codes =

  * 200
    * Request was successful
  * 404
    * Inventory does not exist
  * 500
    * Internal server error occurred
